original_text: So his servants took him out of the chariot and carried him in his second chariot and brought him to Jerusalem. And he died and was buried in the tombs of his fathers. All Judah and Jerusalem mourned for Josiah.
korean_text: 그 부하들이 그를 병거에서 내리게 하고 그의 버금 병거에 태워 예루살렘에 이른 후에 그가 죽으니 그의 조상들의 묘실에 장사되니라 온 유다와 예루살렘 사람들이 요시야를 슬퍼하고

sentences.original_text: So his servants took him out of the chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그의 신하들이 그를 전차에서 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: carried him in his second chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 그의 두 번째 전차에 태웠습니다

sentences.original_text: was buried in the tombs of his fathers
All Judah and Jerusalem mourned for Josiah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 예루살렘 모든 사람이 요시야를 위해 애도했습니다
